name: Paige Hunter
description:
To many, Paige Hunter is a sweet,  old librarian- until her books are overdue. Walk (WASD keys) and dash (space key) to help Paige find the careless readers responsible for her missing books (talk with X key). They'll most likely put up a fight, but with her ruler (J key), stapler gun (K key), and ssshheild (L key) at hand, she'll do anything to make them check out.

Alt+Tab to end the game.

-

Credits (Team Farbridge 1)
